forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southwest wind 10 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 60. Southwest wind 8 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries the cool embrace typical of this coastal jewel, with the temperature resting around a gentle 52 degrees. The sky wears a shroud of clouds, hinting at the collective spirit of the marine layer, which has slipped into the city's crevices, softening the outlines of buildings and rendering distant horizons gently obscured. The night is caressed by a light southwest wind, almost whispering, moving through the streets with a comforting presence.

For Thursday, expect the sun to make its first tentative appearances, playing peek-a-boo with the clouds, and the temperature will nudge slightly higher, inviting those weary of winter to venture outside. Dress in layers, combining a light sweater with a breathable top, for this day will dance between warm and brisk. As the afternoon unfolds, consider a stroll along the waterfront or a quiet visit to one of the city's many cafés, where you can savor a warm drink while watching the world drift by in soft, muted tones. With the marine layer in retreat, expect moments of brightness that breath life into the day, inspiring a revitalizing chorus of laughter and conversation beneath the San Francisco sky.
